info.options: The shaft is available in all common varieties. If there is any extra requests, don't hesitate and contact the seller!

youth.info: We are currently still searching for active and motivated young players to collaborate with, ensuring them to play one of our high quality shafts on their hunt for achievement!

product.ordering: If you would like to order a Kali-Shaft, please proceed using PayPal. To pay via bank transfer, or if you have any custom requests, email the seller here.
product.shipping: Shipping will vary depending on the country of your residence. PayPal will provide you with the exact details before checking out.
